content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Iron ore mine at position(x=-15.0, y=-50.0)
Consists of a Burner Mining Drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a Chest (position x=-16.5, y=-49.5)

### Coal mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of a Burner Mining Drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a Chest (position x=43.5, y=-82.5)

### Furnace group at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of multiple Furnaces at positions (x=40.0, y=-82.0), (x=45.0, y=-83.0), (x=42.0, y=-81.0), (x=45.0, y=-80.0), (x=40.0, y=-79.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of a Steam Engine (position x=10.5, y=10.5), a Boiler (position x=-6.0, y=24.5), and an Offshore Pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Lab at unknown position
Consists of a Lab with an input of automation-science-pack

### Inserter group at unknown position
Consists of multiple Burner Inserters at positions (x=3.5, y=0.5) and (x=0.5, y=3.5)

### Pipe group at position(x=10.5, y=13.5)
Consists of a Pipe Group with multiple pipes

### Electricity group at unknown position
Consists of an Electricity Group with multiple poles

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into a full inventory
- Ensure the inventory is not full before attempting to insert items
- Check the warnings of the entity for 'inventory is full' messages

### Errors when mining with a full chest at drop position
- Empty the chest at the drop position to continue mining
- Check the warnings of the Burner Mining Drill for 'chest at drop position is full' messages

### Errors when using a furnace with no ingredients to smelt
- Ensure the furnace has ingredients to smelt before starting it
- Check the warnings of the Furnace for 'no ingredients to smelt' messages

### Errors when using a boiler with no fuel
- Ensure the boiler has fuel before starting it
- Check the warnings of the Boiler for 'out of fuel' messages

### Errors when using a steam engine with no input liquid
- Ensure the steam engine has an input liquid before starting it
- Check the warnings of the Steam Engine for 'no input liquid' messages
